mapper.select: SELECT c.customerId, c.customerName, c.customerUserId, (SELECT u.realname from user u where u.uid=c.customerUserId) as customerUserName, c.customerCreateId, c.customerSourse, (SELECT d.dictItemName FROM dict d WHERE d.dictType = '002' AND d.dictItemCode = c.customerSourse ) AS customerSourseDict, c.customerIndustry, (SELECT d.dictItemName FROM dict d WHERE d.dictType = '001' AND d.dictItemCode = c.customerIndustry ) AS customerIndustoryDict, c.customerPhone, c.customerAddress, c.customerDate FROM customer c
